scripts.clean: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/scripts && mkdir dist/data && mkdir dist/styles
scripts.serve: npm run clean && npm run watch:js & npm run watch:copy & npm run browser-sync
scripts.watch:js: watchify app/scripts/main.js -p [ parcelify -wo dist/styles/main.css ] -dv -o 'exorcist dist/scripts/main.js.map > dist/scripts/main.js --base ./scripts'
